name: Mermaid Coralie ~ Love and Madness
description:
Inspired by The Little Mermaid, "Mermaid Coralie ~ Love and Madness" is a short adult (18+) story about a mermaid, Coralie, and her first love.

Features
* Very short story, with 3 endings.
* 2.603 words in total.
* A minimalist presentation.
* Dual Language Story and User Interface. Both English and French appears at the same time.
* Adult (sexual) content.
* Steam Achievements.
